title: Provides for disposition of civil judgment or settlement realized by prisoner
summary: Provides for the disposition of civil proceeds realized by a prisoner of a correctional facility who is successful in an action against the state or a locality to a trust fund subject to garnishment or attachment for the cost of such prisoner's confinement, support of his or her dependents, payment of fines and other restitution.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to civil judgments or settlements awarded to inmates
